|        |              |                             |  journey to retrieve something that belongs to him, and it   |                                                                                                                                    |               |      |                        Music credits:                        |                |         |                                                                                                                                    |                      |                |                |                       |                   |                          |
|        |              |                             | was stolen by a crook in the city of Demotopia! |        |              |                             | his quest to retrieve his stolen item! |        |              |                             |  tutorial for newcomers of Cave Story, as well as new music  |                                                                                                                                    |               |      |                 Pipehouse/Mario's Pad: From                  |                |         |                                                                                                                                    |                      |                |                |                       |                   |                          |
|        |              |                             |                     and some new assets!                     |                                                                                                                                    |               |      |     Super Mario RPG, Composed by Yoko Shimomura and Koji     |                |         |                                                                                                                                    |                      |                |                |                       |                   |                          |
